TextLibrary.Text: Flicker
We've traveled to the Dragonrealm and we've tried waking Kelthurax. Now it's time to show me the way to the Hornburg.

Alright, alright. What's the big hurry anyway?

Alright, alright. What's the big hurry anyway?
Orcs have been capturing my people and taking them north through the mountains.

To this place called the Hornburg?

Maybe. All I know is that there is a creature at this Hornburg called the Mechataur, who is involved in all of this.
